remarks: The finite product of continuous complex functions is continuous. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodcncf.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ CC ) $.
fprodcncf.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
fprodcncf.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A /\ k e. B ) -> C e. CC ) $.
fprodcncf.cn $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. B ) -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) $.
fprodcncf $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> prod_ k e. B C ) e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d A k x $.
$d A k x $.
$d B k x $.
$d B k x $.
$d k ph x $.
$d ph x $.
